properties.description: The view in Customer 360 web application.

principalId.description: The principal id being assigned to.

principalType.description: The Type of the principal ID.

permissions.description: The permissions associated with the policy.

primaryKey.description: Primary key associated with the policy.

secondaryKey.description: Secondary key associated with the policy.

isInternal.description: If this is an internal connector.

description.description: The description of the connector mapping.

displayName.description: Display name for the connector mapping.

entityType.description: Defines which entity type the file should map to.

interval.description: The interval of the given frequency to use.

destinationFolder.description: The destination folder where files will be moved to once the import is done.

errorLimit.description: The error limit allowed while importing data.

errorManagementType.description: The type of error management to use for the mapping.

columnDelimiter.description: The character that signifies a break between columns.

quoteCharacter.description: Quote character, used to indicate enquoted fields.

quoteEscapeCharacter.description: Escape character for quotes, can be the same as the quoteCharacter.

completeOperation.description: The operation after import is done.

errorManagement.description: The error management setting for the mapping.

fileFilter.description: The file filter for the mapping.

folderPath.description: The folder path for the mapping.

hasHeader.description: If the file contains a header or not.

structure.description: Ingestion mapping information at property level.

columnName.description: The column name of the import file.

customFormatSpecifier.description: Custom format specifier for input parsing.

isEncrypted.description: Indicates if the column is encrypted.

propertyName.description: The property name of the mapping entity.

maxUnits.description: The maximum number of units can be used.  One unit is 10,000 Profiles and 100,000 Interactions.

minUnits.description: The minimum number of units will be billed. One unit is 10,000 Profiles and 100,000 Interactions.

tenantFeatures.description: The bit flags for enabled hub features. Bit 0 is set to 1 indicates graph is enabled, or disabled if set to 0. Bit 1 is set to 1 indicates the hub is disabled, or enabled if set to 0.

apiEntitySetName.description: The api entity set name. This becomes the odata entity set name for the entity Type being referred in this object.

defaultDataSource.description: Default data source is specifically used in cases where data source is not specified in an instance.

displayName.description: Localized display names for the property.

idPropertyNames.description: The id property names. Properties which uniquely identify an interaction instance.

isActivity.description: An interaction can be tagged as an activity only during create. This enables the interaction to be editable and can enable merging of properties from multiple data sources based on precedence, which is defined at a link level.

largeImage.description: Large Image associated with the Property or EntityType.

localizedAttributes.description: Any custom localized attributes for the Type.

mediumImage.description: Medium Image associated with the Property or EntityType.

participantProfiles.description: Profiles that participated in the interaction.

primaryParticipantProfilePropertyName.description: The primary participant property name for an interaction ,This is used to logically represent the agent of the interaction, Specify the participant name here from ParticipantName.

schemaItemTypeLink.description: The schema org link. This helps ACI identify and suggest semantic models.

smallImage.description: Small Image associated with the Property or EntityType.

timestampFieldName.description: The timestamp property name. Represents the time when the interaction or profile update happened.

displayName.description: Localized display name for the KPI.

expression.description: The computation expression for the KPI.

filter.description: The filter expression for the KPI.

function.description: The computation function for the KPI.

groupBy.description: the group by properties for the KPI.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the KPI.

increasingKpi.description: Whether or not the KPI is an increasing KPI.

displayName.description: Localized display name for the Link.

mappings.description: The set of properties mappings between the source and target Types.

operationType.description: Determines whether this link is supposed to create or delete instances if Link is NOT Reference Only.

participantPropertyReferences.description: The properties that represent the participating profile.

referenceOnly.description: Indicating whether the link is reference only link. This flag is ignored if the Mappings are defined. If the mappings are not defined and it is set to true, links processing will not create or update profiles.

sourceEntityTypeName.description: Name of the source Entity Type.

targetEntityTypeName.description: Name of the target Entity Type.

role.description: The role that the participant is playing in the interaction.

interactionPropertyName.description: The source interaction property that maps to the target profile property.

profilePropertyName.description: The target profile property that maps to the source interaction property.

sourcePropertyName.description: The source property that maps to the target property.

targetPropertyName.description: The target property that maps to the source property.

involvedInteractionTypes.description: Interaction types involved in the prediction.

involvedKpiTypes.description: KPI types involved in the prediction.

mappings.description: Definition of the link mapping of prediction.

grade.description: The grade of the link mapping.

reason.description: The reason of the link mapping.

score.description: The score of the link mapping.

localizedValueNames.description: Localized names of the enum member.

value.description: The integer value of the enum member.

apiEntitySetName.description: The api entity set name. This becomes the odata entity set name for the entity Type being referred in this object.

displayName.description: Localized display names for the property.

largeImage.description: Large Image associated with the Property or EntityType.

localizedAttributes.description: Any custom localized attributes for the Type.

mediumImage.description: Medium Image associated with the Property or EntityType.

schemaItemTypeLink.description: The schema org link. This helps ACI identify and suggest semantic models.

smallImage.description: Small Image associated with the Property or EntityType.

timestampFieldName.description: The timestamp property name. Represents the time when the interaction or profile update happened.

arrayValueSeparator.description: Array value separator for properties with isArray set.

enumValidValues.description: Describes valid values for an enum property.

isArray.description: Indicates if the property is actually an array of the fieldType above on the data api.

isAvailableInGraph.description: Whether property is available in graph or not.

isEnum.description: Indicates if the property is an enum.

isFlagEnum.description: Indicates if the property is an flag enum.

isImage.description: Whether the property is an Image.

isLocalizedString.description: Whether the property is a localized string.

isName.description: Whether the property is a name or a part of name.

isRequired.description: Whether property value is required on instances, IsRequired field only for Interaction. Profile Instance will not check for required field.

maxLength.description: Max length of string. Used only if type is string.

propertyId.description: The ID associated with the property.

schemaItemPropLink.description: URL encoded schema.org item prop link for the property.

displayName.description: Localized display name for the Relationship.

expiryDateTimeUtc.description: The expiry date time in UTC.

lookupMappings.description: Optional property to be used to map fields in profile to their strong ids in related profile.

description.description: Localized descriptions for the Relationship Link.

displayName.description: Localized display name for the Relationship Link.

interactionType.description: The InteractionType associated with the Relationship Link.

mappings.description: The mappings between Interaction and Relationship fields.

profilePropertyReferences.description: The property references for the Profile of the Relationship.

relatedProfilePropertyReferences.description: The property references for the Related Profile of the Relationship.

relationshipName.description: The Relationship associated with the Link.

interactionFieldName.description: The field name on the Interaction Type.

relationshipFieldName.description: The field name on the Relationship metadata.

relatedProfileKeyProperty.description: Specifies the KeyProperty (from StrongId) of the related profile.

fieldMappings.description: Maps a profile property with the StrongId of related profile. This is an array to support StrongIds that are composite key as well.

elements.description: The elements included in the set.

exceptions.description: The elements that are not included in the set, in case elements contains '*' indicating 'all'.

conflationPolicies.description: Widget types set for the assignment.

displayName.description: Localized display names for the metadata.

relationshipLinks.description: The Role assignments set for the relationship links.

relationships.description: The Role assignments set for the relationships.

roleAssignments.description: The Role assignments set for the assignment.

sasPolicies.description: Sas Policies set for the assignment.

segments.description: The Role assignments set for the assignment.

widgetTypes.description: Widget types set for the assignment.

keyPropertyNames.description: The properties which make up the unique ID.

strongIdName.description: The Name identifying the strong ID.

sourcePropertyName.description: Property name on the source Entity Type.

targetPropertyName.description: Property name on the target Entity Type.

displayName.description: Localized display name for the view.

properties.description: The view in Customer 360 web application.
